required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY2951742 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of LY2951742 in Healthy Subjects Following a Subcutaneous Administration of a Lyophilized Formulation or a Solution Formulation

brief_summary.textblock:
The purposes of this study are:
- To evaluate tolerability of the LY2951742 solution injectable formulation (Part A)
- To measure how much of the LY2951742 lyophilized (freeze dried) injectable formulation is absorbed into the blood stream and how long it takes the body to get rid of it compared to the LY2951742 solution injectable formulation after a single injection under the skin (subcutaneous [SC]) (Part B).
Information about any side effects that may occur will also be collected. Each part of the study will last about six months. Participants may only enroll in one part.

primary_outcome.measure: The Number of Participants with an Injection Site Adverse Event
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: Predose through 48 hours after study drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Relative Bioavailability of Lyophilized to Solution Formulations on the Basis of Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of LY2951742
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part B: Predose through 5 months after study drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Relative Bioavailability of Lyophilized to Solution Formulations on the Basis of Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of LY2951742
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part B: Predose through 5 months after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD) of Plasma Calcitonin Gene Related Peptide (CGRP)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 5 months after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of Plasma Calcitonin Gene Related Peptide (CGRP)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 5 months after study drug administration
Predose through 5 months after study drug administration

arm_group.description: LY2951742 solution formulation in a prefilled syringe given SC once.
Placebo in a prefilled syringe given SC once.
LY2951742 lyophilized (freeze dried) formulation given SC once.
LY2951742 solution formulation in a prefilled syringe given SC once.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female healthy participants
- Have a body mass index of 19.0 to 35.0 kilograms per meter square (kg/mÂ²), inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Currently smoke in excess of 5 cigarettes/day
